Text:
The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many tongues?  
 Do we speak? 
 Does AI know what your ancestors felt?

The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many hands? 
 Hold us afloat?

Does AI know how compassion feels? 
 Can bots heal?  
 Does AI know how compassion feels? 
 Can bots heal? 
 A robot that understands a mother's pain?
What is a woman's life worth?

Can we be so sure? 
 Can we be so certain? 
 Is there such a thing as the truth?

Would we be in control? 
 Is the world a machine? 
 Is life a world ? 
  Would we be in control? 
 Is the world a machine? 
 Is life a world ?
DO: Add a 0 to your age and donate. Make the years count!
